'''18w19b''' is the thirty-fourth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.13]], released on May 9, 2018<ref>{{snap|18w19a|May 8, 2018}}</ref>, which fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''Sound events'''
* Added the <code>entity.husk.converted_to_zombie</code> sound event.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=18w19b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|12269|Various particles had glitchy movement.
|24390|Books do not sign properly and when trying to sign, the title cannot be edited before signing again.
|;dev
| 122308 | Zombies can no longer break wooden doors.
| 123351 | Growing grass with bonemeal deletes upper block.
| 124694 | {{cmd|bossbar}} create subcommand named inconsistently.
| 127249 | Drowned don't show armor.
| 128243 | Dolphins do not try to get into the water.
| 128681 | Dolphins don't drop experience.
|;previous
| 129221 |Putting item with NBT in anvil interface crashes the game.
| 129232 |Command NBT comparisons that include strings or numbers always fail.
| 129233 | Items with additional NBT you hold don't show up or "wiggle" up and down; damaged tools partially don't work anymore.
| 129246 | The sound for Parrots imitating Phantoms is empty.
| 129247 |Programmable controller interference bug.
| 129282 |Items with NBT cannot stack.
}}
'''Other fixes'''
* Worlds opened before 18w16a can now be opened again, although worlds created in 18w16a are still wiped.<ref>{{tweet|ProfMobius|994186578611273728|After investigating the problem, snapshot worlds pre 16a will load properly. 16a worlds are still broken. A fix is in the pipeline.|May 9, 2018}}</ref></onlyinclude>
